sn56.1:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. … pe … "Samādhiṁ, bhikkhave, bhāvetha. Samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn56.1:2: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yogo karaṇīyo, ‘Ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti yogo karaṇīyo, ‘Ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti yogo karaṇīyo, ‘Ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yogo karaṇīyo"ti.
